casebody.data:
No. 10-328. El-Shifa Pharmaceutical Industries Company, et al., Petitioners v. United States. 562 U.S. 1178, 131 S. Ct. 997,

178 L. Ed. 2d 826,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 829. January 18, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied.

Same case below, 391 U.S. App. D.C. 51, 607 F.3d 836.
